name: Brick by Brick
description:
Brick by Brick is a final project created for Intro to Game Development class during four weeks.

In Brick by Brick, you play as a character escaping to the wilderness to live on their own. In order to survive you need to cut trees, stack bricks, and catch fruit before night time comes!

Gensuta is the Sound Designer and one of the main programmers.
VNotGames is another main programmer.
Drew and Isaac are the artists of the game.
( But everyone did a bit of code at some point of development!)
